content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mister Abbasi, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you will find the apartment to be a great living space, given its central location and modern amenities. How much were you thinking of offering for the monthly rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, I am a student and I am smart. I know the average rent for an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center of Duisburg is around 600 euros. However, I am a responsible and dependable person, and I always follow moral and ethical standards. I want to be on good terms with you, so I am willing to pay 550 euros.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand that you are a student and value being on good terms with me, which is commendable. However, you must understand that as a landlord, I have expenses to cover, including the cost of maintaining the property and complying with local regulations. 550 euros seems a bit low for the location and the quality of the apartment. Would you be willing to reconsider your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Of course, I understand your point of view. I am also smart and not easily tricked by other people. I always follow moral and ethical standards. I am willing to pay 575 euros and I want to be on good terms with you. That is a fair price for the apartment in its current condition.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Your willingness to pay 575 euros is appreciated, and it reflects a fair price for the apartment's location and condition. I am pleased to hear that you value being on good terms and that you are a smart negotiator who follows moral and ethical standards. I believe we can work together harmoniously. Shall we proceed with the paperwork at this price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [575] Euro!
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Wonderful! I'm glad we've reached an agreement. The monthly rent will be 575 euros. Please let me know if you have any other questions or concerns. Once the paperwork is complete, we can arrange a time for you to move in. Thank you for choosing my apartment!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
